Docs.summary: Represents the look and feel of a row in a table layout.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The RowStyle class represents the user interface (UI) characteristics of a row in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel>. The styles for all the rows in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> are collected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel.RowStyles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
This simple class offers the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RowStyle.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutStyle.SizeType%2A> for a row.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to extract a RowStyle from a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutRowStyleCollection>.
This code example is part of a larger example provided for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TableLayoutPanel> class.
